mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.adapter.statistics

Interface DataStatisticsStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloDataStatisticsStore, AccumuloDataStatisticsStoreExt

    public interface DataStatisticsStore
    This is responsible for persisting data statistics (either in memory or to disk depending on the implementation).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CloseableIterator<DataStatistics<?>> getAllDataStatistics(String... authorizations)
      Get all data statistics from the store
      DataStatistics<?> getDataStatistics(ByteArrayId adapterId, ByteArrayId statisticsId, String... authorizations)
      Get statistics by adapter ID and the statistics ID (which will define a unique statistic)
      CloseableIterator<DataStatistics<?>> getDataStatistics(ByteArrayId adapterId, String... authorizations)
      Get all data statistics from the store by a data adapter ID
      void incorporateStatistics(DataStatistics<?> statistics)
      Add the statistics to the store, overwriting existing data statistics with the aggregation of these statistics and the existing statistics
      boolean removeStatistics(ByteArrayId adapterId, ByteArrayId statisticsId, String... authorizations)
      Remove a statistic from the store
      void setStatistics(DataStatistics<?> statistics)
      This will write the statistics to the underlying store.

    • Method Detail

      • setStatistics

        void setStatistics(DataStatistics<?> statistics)
        This will write the statistics to the underlying store. Note that this will overwrite whatever the current persisted statistics are with the given statistics ID and data adapter ID. Use incorporateStatistics to aggregate the statistics with any existing statistics.
        Parameters:
        statistics - The statistics to write

      • incorporateStatistics

        void incorporateStatistics(DataStatistics<?> statistics)
        Add the statistics to the store, overwriting existing data statistics with the aggregation of these statistics and the existing statistics
        Parameters:
        statistics - the data statistics

      • getDataStatistics

        CloseableIterator<DataStatistics<?>> getDataStatistics(ByteArrayId adapterId,
                                                     String... authorizations)
        Get all data statistics from the store by a data adapter ID
        Parameters:
        adapterId - the data adapter ID
        Returns:
        the list of statistics for the given adapter, empty if it doesn't exist

      • getAllDataStatistics

        CloseableIterator<DataStatistics<?>> getAllDataStatistics(String... authorizations)
        Get all data statistics from the store
        Returns:
        the list of all statistics

      • getDataStatistics

        DataStatistics<?> getDataStatistics(ByteArrayId adapterId,
                                  ByteArrayId statisticsId,
                                  String... authorizations)
        Get statistics by adapter ID and the statistics ID (which will define a unique statistic)
        Parameters:
        adapterId - The adapter ID for the requested statistics
        statisticsId - the statistics ID for the requested statistics
        Returns:
        the persisted statistics value

      • removeStatistics

        boolean removeStatistics(ByteArrayId adapterId,
                       ByteArrayId statisticsId,
                       String... authorizations)
        Remove a statistic from the store
        Parameters:
        adapterId -
        statisticsId -
        Returns:
        a flag indicating whether a statistic had existed with the given IDs and was successfully deleted.
